**********

# Non-ASCII characters should not interfere with line length calculation.

def unicode_docstring_pythagoras() -> None:
    """aÂ² + bÂ² = cÂ²"""
    return None

    """Î” = âˆš(bÂ² - 4ac)"""
    return None

    """emoji ğŸ˜„ğŸš€ with sparkle âœ¨"""
    return None
